channel.title: Plugin Discovery Hub - New Plugins
channel.description: Stay updated with newly added Obsidian plugins

item.title: Tasks Map
item.author: NicoKNL
item.description: A visual graph view of your tasks.

item.title: Google Calendar Importer
item.author: Fan Li
item.description: A simple and light-weighted google calendar importer, allow injecting the events / tasks of a day automatically to your daily notes, or import it to anywhere with a command.
